TextBlock.Text: WELBAR: Am I the only one who hears that humming sound?
WELBAR: It sounds strange, but... I wouldn't doubt that it's a black hole.
BLUH: Don't be silly, black holes don't make sound. But solid matter does.
RERERE: What do you mean? <color=red>(obnoxious chuckle and wheezing)</color> I hear nothing!
WELBAR: But then this whole moon would be gone by now, wouldn't it?
RERERE: Solid as in state of matter! <color=red>(loud snort and laughter)</color>
